name: Single filer at very high income
description: Very high earner at €500,000 in Spain - in top IRPF bracket

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 Spanish national IRPF rates, SS (capped), and progressive solidarity contribution
sources.notes: IRPF: 47% on income above €300k. SS capped at €61,214.40. Solidarity on €438,785.60 excess at progressive rates: 0.19%/0.21%/0.24%. Total solidarity ~€1,042.68.
